Description:
We are hiring a Sales Manager.Candidates who have the required qualifications and good experience may apply.Develop and execute effective sales strategies to achieve company revenue and growth targets.
Lead, coached, and manage a team of sales representatives, providing guidance, training, and performance evaluations.
Set sales goals and targets for the team, monitoring progress and taking corrective actions as needed.
Identify and explore new business opportunities, markets, and potential clients.
Foster and maintain strong relationships with existing clients while actively seeking out new client partnerships.
Collaborate with marketing and product teams to align sales strategies with product offerings and customer needs.
Conduct market research and competitor analysis to stay informed about industry trends and developments.Skills
Skills: • Minimum 10 years of experience in the same field.
• Proven knowledge and execution of successful development strategies.
• Must have a valid Qatar driving license.
• With a transferable visa and valid QID/NOC
